database.name: VIEW SCO_FACT_ACCT_V
database.view: SELECT facct.fact_acct_id AS sco_fact_acct_v_id, facct.ad_client_id, facct.ad_org_id, facct.created, facct.createdby, facct.updated, facct.updatedby, facct.isactive, facct.account_id AS c_elementvalue_id, facct.c_acctschema_id, facct.datetrx, facct.dateacct, facct.c_period_id, facct.gl_category_id, facct.c_tax_id, facct.postingtype, facct.c_currency_id, facct.amtsourcedr, facct.amtsourcecr, facct.amtacctdr, facct.amtacctcr, facct.c_uom_id, facct.qty, facct.m_product_id, facct.c_bpartner_id, facct.description, facct.fact_acct_group_id, facct.seqno, facct.factaccttype, facct.acctvalue, facct.acctdescription, facct.c_doctype_id, facct.c_costcenter_id, facct.em_sco_regnumber, valcom.c_validcombination_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '318' THEN facct.record_id WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '224' THEN facct.em_sco_record3_id ELSE NULL END AS c_invoice_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '319' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS m_inout_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '224' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS gl_journal_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '4D8C3B3C31D1410DA046140C9F024D17' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS fin_finacc_transaction_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = 'D1A97202E832470285C9B1EB026D54E2' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS fin_payment_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '6E25DC026D874BD58792E1C3994CEF16' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS sco_pwithholding_receipt_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '251100CF447643CFAAFCF7F6A4975DA8' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS sco_swithholding_receipt_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '29987BE302E04781BE3868E573123BDE' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS sco_billofexchange_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = 'B1B7075C46934F0A9FD4C4D0F1457B42' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS fin_reconciliation_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '800060' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS a_amortization_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '5B7785A4E6B748D28DFB3E194411C5CB' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS sim_imp_costing_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = 'CDCFC9F1E20B44D9B80B3C1F374BEA05' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS swa_movementcode_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '321' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS m_inventory_id, CASE WHEN facct.ad_table_id = '325' THEN facct.record_id ELSE NULL END AS m_production_id, CASE WHEN COALESCE(facct.em_sco_record3_table_id, '') = 'F90F4E012DF74D2B92BACC79473FF588' THEN facct.em_sco_record3_id ELSE NULL END AS sco_rendicioncuentas_id, CASE WHEN COALESCE(facct.em_sco_record3_table_id, '') = '135FAE2571DB4028A90D5CAA6FAC154C' THEN facct.em_sco_record3_id ELSE NULL END AS sco_prepayment_id, CASE WHEN COALESCE(facct.em_sco_record3_table_id, '') = 'A64BF5FB928C4EC1BACC023D6DC87F3C' THEN facct.em_sco_record3_id ELSE NULL END AS sco_internal_doc_id FROM fact_acct facct, c_validcombination valcom WHERE facct.account_id = valcom.account_id
